messages.content: Krpyala kay pawdar
messages.en: Kripyala powder
messages.standalone_question: What is the meaning of "Krpyala kay pawdar"?
messages.standalone_en: What is the meaning of "Krpyala kay pawdar"?

messages.content: तुमच्या "थॉम्पसन" प्लॉटमध्ये सध्या "सबसं" (Subcane) या पिकाच्या टप्प्यात आहात. या टप्प्यात, तुम्हाला पाण्याची योग्य व्यवस्थापन आणि खतांची गरज आहे. तुम्हाला काही विशिष्ट माहिती हवी आहे का?
messages.en: In your "Thompson" plot, you're currently in the "subcane" crop stage. At this stage, you need proper water management and fertilizers. Do you want any specific information?

messages.content: डावणी  दिसत आहेत
messages.en: Looks like a witch
messages.standalone_question: Are the plants showing signs of wilting?
messages.standalone_en: Are the plants showing signs of wilting?

messages.content: डावणी म्हणजे पिकांमध्ये काही समस्या किंवा रोगांचा संकेत असू शकतो. तुम्ही तुमच्या पिकाची प्रतिमा अपलोड करू शकता का? त्यामुळे मी त्याचे विश्लेषण करून तुम्हाला योग्य सल्ला देऊ शकेन.
messages.en: Dwarf may be an indication of some problems or diseases in the crops. Can you upload an image of your crop? So I can analyze it and give you the right advice.

messages.content: सेसर डाउन झाला का
messages.en: Is the cesser down?

messages.content:
सर्व सेन्सर कार्यरत आहेत. खालील माहिती उपलब्ध आहे:

1. **Kali Mandap**:
   - मातीचा तापमान: 27.62°C
   - मातीची आर्द्रता: 26 kPa (सुखा)
   - बॅटरी: 76%

2. **Pabha H**:
   - मातीचा तापमान: 27.56°C
   - मातीची आर्द्रता: 23 kPa (सुखा)
   - बॅटरी: 48%

3. **Y Plot 1 acra**:
   - मातीचा तापमान: 26.94°C
   - मातीची आर्द्रता: 21 kPa (सुखा)
   - बॅटरी: 59%

सर्व सेन्सर कार्यरत आहेत आणि डेटा पाठवत आहेत.
messages.en:
All sensors are functional. The following information is available:

1. Kali Mandap:
   - Soil temperature: 27.62°C
   - Soil humidity: 26 kPa (dry)
   - Battery: 76%

2. **Pabha H**:
   - Soil temperature: 27.56°C
   - Soil Humidity: 23 kPa (dry)
   - Battery: 48%

3. **Y Plot 1 Acra**:
   - Soil temperature: 26.94°C
   - Soil Humidity: 21 kPa (dry)
   - Battery: 59%

All sensors are working and sending data.

messages.content: Hi
messages.en: Hi
messages.standalone_question: What would you like to talk about?
messages.standalone_en: What would you like to talk about?

messages.content: नमस्कार, हर्षल! तुम्हाला कशाबद्दल मदतीची आवश्यकता आहे?
messages.en: Hello, Harshal! What do you need help with?

messages.content: वापसा कधी येणार मोठी बांधणी करायची आहे
messages.en: When will the return come?
messages.standalone_question: When will the usage come? I need to do a major construction.
messages.standalone_en: When will the usage come? I need to do a major construction.
messages.content_transliterated: vapsa kadhi yenar mothi bandhani karayachi aahe

messages.content: मोठी बांधणी करण्यासाठी वापसा येण्याची वेळ हवामानाच्या परिस्थितीवर अवलंबून असते. तुम्हाला वापसा येण्याची अचूक माहिती हवी असल्यास, कृपया तुम्हाला हवामानाची माहिती पाहिजे का?
messages.en: The return time to build a larger one depends on weather conditions. If you want accurate information on the return, please do you need weather information?

messages.content: होय
messages.en: Yes
messages.standalone_question: Do you want to know the weather information?
messages.standalone_en: Do you want to know the weather information?

messages.content: तुम्हाला हवामानाची माहिती पाहिजे का? जर तुम्हाला वापसा येण्याची अचूक माहिती हवी असेल, तर मी तुम्हाला हवामानाचा अंदाज देऊ शकतो.
messages.en: Do you want weather information? If you want accurate information on the return, I can give you a weather forecast.

messages.content: द्या
messages.en: Give
messages.standalone_question: Could you provide the weather forecast?
messages.standalone_en: Could you provide the weather forecast?

tools:
get_hourly_weather_forecast  
Provides hourly weather forecast for today and the next 4 days for the farmer's plots. Use only for forecast, not actual measured values.

get_daily_weather_forecast  
Provides the next 14 days from today, daily weather forecast for the farmer's plots. Use only for forecast, not current values.

messages.en:
The next 14 days weather forecast for your "Sugar Plot 1":

- 8 June: Temperature 21.7°C – 31°C, Humidity 82%, Rain 1.9 mm
- June 9: Temperature 22.4°C - 30°C, Humidity 84%, Rain 4.7 mm
- June 10: Temperature 23.1°C - 30.9°C, Humidity 83%, Rain 18.4 mm
- June 11: Temperature 23.1°C - 30°C, Humidity 84%, Rain 0.3 mm
- June 12: Temperature 23°C - 29.3°C, Humidity 87%, Rain 10.5 mm
- June 13: Temperature 22.7°C - 28.2°C, Humidity 89%, Rain 0.4 mm
- **14 June**: Temperature 22.5°C - 26.8°C, Humidity 89%, Rain 2.5 mm
- June 15: Temperature 22.4°C - 25.3°C, Humidity 88%, Rain 0.0 mm
- June 16: Temperature 21.9°C – 23.9°C, Humidity 94%, Rain 4.8 mm
- June 17: Temperature 21.5°C – 24.6°C, Humidity 91%, Rain 0.5 mm
- June 18: Temperature 21.5°C – 24.7°C, Humidity 90%, Rain 0.4 mm
- June 19: Temperature 21.9°C – 23.5°C, Humidity 92%, Rain 0.4 mm
- June 20: Temperature 21.5°C - 24.2°C, Humidity 92%, Rain 0.3 mm

There is a possibility of rain for your plot, especially on June 10 and 12. If you are planning to build a big one, consider these dates.

messages.content: आज पावसाचा अंदाज आहे का
messages.en: Is there a rain forecast today?
messages.standalone_question: Is there a rain forecast for today?
messages.standalone_en: Is there a rain forecast for today?

tools:
get_irrigation_forecast  
Gives the irrigation requirement forecast for any day, today and beyond. Dates are mandatory. Output is humanized with day of the week and optimal moisture details if suitable.

messages.content: 10 जून 2 जून रोजी पावसाची शक्‍यता आहे का
messages.en: Is there a possibility of rain on June 10 and June 2?
messages.standalone_question: Is there a possibility of rain on June 10th and June 2nd?
messages.standalone_en: Is there a possibility of rain on June 10th and June 2nd?
messages.content_transliterated: 10 june 2 june roji pavasachi shakyata aahe ka

messages.content:
10 जून रोजी "साखरेच्या प्लॉट 1" साठी पावसाची शक्यता आहे. अंदाजानुसार, त्या दिवशी 18.4 मिमी पाऊस पडण्याची शक्यता आहे, आणि पावसाची शक्यता 25% आहे. तापमान 23.1°C ते 30.9°C दरम्यान राहील. 

तुमच्या बांधणीसाठी ही माहिती उपयुक्त ठरू शकते.
messages.en:
Rain is expected for "Sugar Plot 1" on June 10. According to the forecast, there is a 18.4 mm chance of rain on that day, and there is a 25% chance of rain. Temperatures will hover between 23.1°C and 30.9°C. 

This information can be helpful for your construction.

messages.content: દાડમ ઉપર ટપકી છે કયો રોગ કહેવાય કઈ દવા મરાય<user uploaded image for analysis at 'plot1pomo321/2025-06-08-1749361872607.jpg'>
messages.en: Which disease is called which medicine dies<user uploaded image for analysis at 'plot1pomo321/2025-06-08-1749361872607.jpg' >
messages.standalone_question: What disease is referred to as "dādama upar tapakī" and what medicine is used to treat it?
messages.standalone_en: What disease is referred to as "dādama upar tapakī" and what medicine is used to treat it?
messages.content_transliterated: dadam upar tapaki che kayo rog kahevay kai dava maray<user uploaded image for analysis at 'plot1pomo321/2025-06-08-1749361872607.jpg'>

messages.content:
તમે અપલોડ કરેલ છબીમાં દાડમના ફળો પર રંગ બદલાવ અને સપાટી પર સમસ્યાઓ દેખાઈ રહી છે, જે રોગ અથવા પેસ્ટની સંકેત આપી શકે છે. પરંતુ, હાલના દોરમાં ચોક્કસ દવા માટેની ભલામણ મળી નથી.

કૃપા કરીને વધુ સ્પષ્ટ છબી આપો, જેમાં અસરગ્રસ્ત વિસ્તારો પર ધ્યાન કેન્દ્રિત કરવામાં આવે, સારી પ્રકાશ અને ફોકસ સાથે. આથી, ચોક્કસ સમસ્યાઓની ઓળખ કરવામાં વધુ સહાય મળશે.
messages.en:
The image you uploaded shows color changes on pomegranate fruits and problems on the surface, which can indicate disease or paste. But the recommendation for a specific drug has not been found in the current round.

Please give a more clear image, with a focus on the affected areas, with better lighting and focus. This will further help in identifying specific problems.

messages.content: કાળા કલરના ટપકા રિયા તે<user uploaded image for analysis at 'plot1pomo321/2025-06-08-1749361942473.jpg'>
messages.en: Black dots Rhea Te<user uploaded image for analysis at 'plot1pomo321/2025-06-08-1749361942473.jpg' >
messages.standalone_question: What is the cause of the black spots on the fruit?
messages.standalone_en: What is the cause of the black spots on the fruit?
messages.content_transliterated: kada kalarana tapaka riya te<user uploaded image for analysis at 'plot1pomo321/2025-06-08-1749361942473.jpg'>

messages.content:
છબીમાં દેખાતા કાળા ટપકાઓ દાડમના ફળોમાં રોગના સંકેત હોઈ શકે છે. અહીં કેટલીક સામાન્ય વ્યવસ્થાઓ છે:

1. **અસરગ્રસ્ત ફળો દૂર કરો**: રોગના લક્ષણો દર્શાવતા ફળોને દૂર કરો અને નાશ કરો, જેથી વધુ ફેલાવા અટકાય.
2. **હવા પ્રવાહ સુધારો**: છોડ વચ્ચે યોગ્ય અંતર રાખીને હવા પ્રવાહ વધારવા માટે ખાતરી કરો.
3. **ફંગિસાઇડનો ઉપયોગ**: જો સમસ્યા ચાલુ રહે, તો સ્થાનિક કૃષિ માર્ગદર્શિકાઓને અનુસરીને વ્યાપક ફંગિસાઇડનો ઉપયોગ કરવા પર વિચાર કરો.

વધુ ચોક્કસ સલાહ માટે, કૃપા કરીને સ્થાનિક કૃષિ નિષ્ણાત અથવા વિસ્તરણ સેવા સાથે સંપર્ક કરો. જો તમારી પાસે વધુ છબીઓ અથવા પાકની સ્થિતિ વિશે વિગતો હોય, તો શેર કરવા માટે સ્વતંત્ર રહો!
messages.en:
The black dots seen in the image may be a sign of disease in pomegranate fruits. Here are some common arrangements:

1. **Remove affected fruits**: Remove and destroy fruits showing symptoms of the disease, so as to prevent further spread.
2. **Improve air flow**: Make sure to increase the air flow by keeping a proper distance between the plants.
3. Use of **Fungicide**: If the problem persists, consider using a wide range of fungisides following local agricultural guidelines.

For more specific advice, please contact a local agriculture expert or extension service. If you have more images or details about crop conditions, be free to share!

કૃપા કરીને વધુ સ્પષ્ટ છબી આપો, જેમાં અસરગ્રસ્ત વિસ્તારો પર ધ્યાન કેન્દ્રિત કરવામાં આવે, સારી પ્રકાશ અને ફોકસ સાથે. આથી, ચોક્કસ સમસ્યાઓની ઓળખ કરવામાં વધુ સહાય મળશે.

છબીમાં દેખાતા કાળા ટપકાઓ દાડમના ફળોમાં રોગના સંકેત હોઈ શકે છે. અહીં કેટલીક સામાન્ય વ્યવસ્થાઓ છે:

1. **અસરગ્રસ્ત ફળો દૂર કરો**: રોગના લક્ષણો દર્શાવતા ફળોને દૂર કરો અને નાશ કરો, જેથી વધુ ફેલાવા અટકાય.

messages.en:
The black dots seen in the image may be a sign of disease in pomegranate fruits. Here are some common arrangements:

1. **Remove affected fruits**: Remove and destroy fruits showing symptoms of the disease, so as to prevent further spread.
2. **Improve air flow**: Make sure to increase the air flow by keeping a proper distance between the plants.
3. Use of **Fungicide**: If the problem persists, consider using a wide range of fungisides following local agricultural guidelines.

For more specific advice, please contact a local agriculture expert or extension service. If you have more images or details about crop conditions, be free to share!

messages.content: Ketla divas thya
messages.en: Ketla divas thya

messages.content: Aaje Sunday chhe, 8 June 2025. Aapne 2025-03-10 thi 8 June sudhi 90 divas thaya chhe.
messages.en: Today is Sunday, June 8, 2025. It has been 90 days since 2025-03-10 to June 8.

messages.content: મગફળીમાં હવે શું સારવાર આપ્યો
messages.en: What treatment did you get now in peanuts?
messages.standalone_question: What treatment has been given to the peanuts now?
messages.standalone_en: What treatment has been given to the peanuts now?

messages.content: મગફળીમાં હાલમાં કોઈ સારવાર આપવામાં આવી નથી. જો તમને વધુ માહિતી અથવા સલાહની જરૂર હોય, તો મને જણાવો!
messages.en: No treatment has been given in peanuts at present. If you need more information or advice, let me know!

messages.content: મગફળીમાં હવે શું સારવાર આપ્યો
messages.en: What treatment did you get now in peanuts?
messages.standalone_question: What treatment has been given to the peanuts now?
messages.standalone_en: What treatment has been given to the peanuts now?

messages.content: મગફળીમાં હાલમાં કોઈ સારવાર આપવામાં આવી નથી. જો તમને વધુ માહિતી અથવા સલાહની જરૂર હોય, તો મને જણાવો!
messages.en: No treatment has been given in peanuts at present. If you need more information or advice, let me know!
